snippet.title: Project UNSEEK | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A group of high schoolers went on a supposedly fun road trip. Unbeknownst to them, they were brought to another dimension. Realizing something was off, they decided to run away. What will happen to them?

Add to your Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1758470/Project_UNSEEK/

2 V 6 Asymmetrical Multiplayer PVP*
In this game, you and 7 other players will be randomly divided into 2 teams: 6 Humans and 2 Creatures. 

Objectives
 As humans, you must escape the woods by hacking the system and avoiding being captured by creatures. As creatures, you must capture or avoid the humans to escape before the time runs out.FeaturesFog of Survival HorrorBecause of the foggy environment, players can only see either friends or foes from their limited field of view. 

Plenty of Characters to Play As
In this demo, you can choose to play between 4 Humans and 2 Creatures, each with unique skills and traits.

Skills and Items to Help your Mission
Each Human and Creature character has unique skills and tools to help them finish the objective.

Variety of Maps to Experiment with
In this demo, you can play using 2 available maps, Quiet Hills and SPADE'S Testing Lab.

Platform:- Windows PC- Mac
Project UNSEEK Social Media
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/projectunseek
- Discord: https://discord.gg/N2vBaxHhH7
- Website: http://unseek.arsanesia.com/
Arsanesia Social Media:
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/arsanesia

 Twitch: https://twitch.tv/arsanesia
